Simple right? Youve to be certain of the questions below, before going to the next stage. Below are the questions, explained.
If your companys website traffic is down and you arent receiving the visibility you want, chances are that its time to reevaluate your sites search engine optimization (SEO) to help boost your traffic.
1. Google Search Console
If you dont have this set up, you wont be able to determine if Google is having difficulty crawling and indexing your site.
2. Toxic Links
While link building is essential, having too many toxic links can create problems. Toxic links are links to spam sites or links to websites that are only for the purpose of link building, and often these sites contain malware or spam.
3. Broken Links And Redirects
If you have several 301 redirects or broken links, search engines will rate your site lower.
4. Performance
Search engines heavily weigh website performance and site speed when rating sites. If your site has outdated plugins or too many plugins that are clashing, it can slow down performance speed.
5. Reviews
Whether you get a positive or negative review online, its essential for your business to respond. Clients heavily rely on online reviews when selecting service providers. Promptly responding to reviews is necessary, and since Google weighs reviews, its essential to respond to any left on Google. Remember to answer all reviews, though, including those on Yelp, Amazon, Angie's List or any other place that rates businesses like yours.

The answer is in our Pods. They contain both dry and liquid ingredients and are sealed separately until the moment the Pod is popped. When Drinkfinity Pods are popped, they transform your water into a delicious 20oz beverage, with no artificial flavors or artificial sweeteners.[/vc_column_text][spacing desktop_height="0" mobile_height="20" smobile_height="20"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Drinkfinity is a PepsiCo venture and has its home in Miami, Florida where it has always tried to act as an independent company. This approach allows us to work disruptively, as any startup company would, with the encouragement and support from PepsiCo leadership.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][spacing desktop_height="95" mobile_height="50" smobile_height="50"][imagesgrid mode="mosaic" image_crop="full" images="12138,12139,12140" gapv="30" gaph="30" column="3c"][spacing desktop_height="100" mobile_height="60" smobile_height="60"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Creative Application
item.dc:creator: amber@admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][spacing desktop_height="130" mobile_height="60" smobile_height="60"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][singleheading heading_color="#222222" heading_bottom_margin="23px" line_width="4px" line_height="28px" heading_padding="30px" line_top="10px" heading_font_weight="600" heading_font_size="38px" heading_line_height="50px" heading_letter_spacing="-0.25px" heading="A new drink for every moment"][vc_column_text]
We wanted to craft an authentic drink that gave our consumers choices and empowered them to create their own experience.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][spacing desktop_height="80" mobile_height="40" smobile_height="40"][gridbox border_type="no"][vc_column_text]
Date
AUGUST 2019[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
Services
BRANDING[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
Client
DRINKFINITY[/vc_column_text][/gridbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][spacing desktop_height="60" mobile_height="40" smobile_height="40"][divider color="#e7e7e7"][spacing desktop_height="65" mobile_height="45" smobile_height="45"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]What is Drinkfinity? The answer is in our Pods. They contain both dry and liquid ingredients and are sealed separately until the moment the Pod is popped. When Drinkfinity Pods are popped, they transform your water into a delicious 20oz beverage, with no artificial flavors or artificial sweeteners.[/vc_column_text][spacing desktop_height="0" mobile_height="20" smobile_height="20"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Drinkfinity is a PepsiCo venture and has its home in Miami, Florida where it has always tried to act as an independent company. This approach allows us to work disruptively, as any startup company would, with the encouragement and support from PepsiCo leadership.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][spacing desktop_height="95" mobile_height="50" smobile_height="50"][imagesgrid mode="mosaic" image_crop="full" images="12138,12139,12140" gapv="30" gaph="30" column="3c"][spacing desktop_height="100" mobile_height="60" smobile_height="60"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row][vc_column][spacing desktop_height="130" mobile_height="60" smobile_height="60"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][singleheading heading_color="#222222" heading_bottom_margin="23px" line_width="4px" line_height="28px" heading_padding="30px" line_top="10px" heading_font_weight="600" heading_font_size="38px" heading_line_height="50px" heading_letter_spacing="-0.25px" heading="A new drink for every moment"][vc_column_text]
We wanted to craft an authentic drink that gave our consumers choices and empowered them to create their own experience.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][spacing desktop_height="80" mobile_height="40" smobile_height="40"][gridbox border_type="no"][vc_column_text]
Date
AUGUST 2019[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
Services
BRANDING[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
Client
DRINKFINITY[/vc_column_text][/gridbox][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][spacing desktop_height="60" mobile_height="40" smobile_height="40"][divider color="#e7e7e7"][spacing desktop_height="65" mobile_height="45" smobile_height="45"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]What is Drinkfinity? The answer is in our Pods. They contain both dry and liquid ingredients and are sealed separately until the moment the Pod is popped. When Drinkfinity Pods are popped, they transform your water into a delicious 20oz beverage, with no artificial flavors or artificial sweeteners.[/vc_column_text][spacing desktop_height="0" mobile_height="20" smobile_height="20"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Drinkfinity is a PepsiCo venture and has its home in Miami, Florida where it has always tried to act as an independent company. This approach allows us to work disruptively, as any startup company would, with the encouragement and support from PepsiCo leadership.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][spacing desktop_height="95" mobile_height="50" smobile_height="50"][imagesgrid mode="mosaic" image_crop="full" images="12138,12139,12140" gapv="30" gaph="30" column="3c"][spacing desktop_height="100" mobile_height="60" smobile_height="60"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
